text: Pholidobolus affinis, Peters's pholiodobolus, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==References== Category:Pholidobolus Category:Reptiles of Ecuador Category:Endemic fauna of Ecuador Category:Reptiles described in 1863 Category:Taxa named by Wilhelm Peters
title: Pholidobolus affinis
